Title: Relates to funding for free-standing mental health clinics
Summary: Removes the requirement that federal participation must be provided for free-standing mental health clinics to be paid state funding owed to them for uncompensated care rendered.
LawCode: Amd ยง2807-p, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to funding for free-standing mental health clinics
